body_html:
Well, why just you do not build a matrix of combinations?
AVX -> AVX2 -> GPU -> CPU Only
If the builds take too much time, prepare docker images which are ready for building and people will build them themselves.

body:
Well, why just you do not build a matrix of combinations?
AVX -> AVX2 -> GPU -> CPU Only
If the builds take too much time, prepare docker images which are ready for building and people will build them themselves.
